Articles.Content: So I recently got a new gaming computer with windows 10 on it, and i was trying to install mods for ksp, but they would not actually install. I extracted the mod folders, and put them in the gamedata folder but it still did not add, all the mods are updated to the 1.2 version too. Does anyone know why this will not work?
I'm a Windows 10 user too, but have no problems so far. Did you forget the modulemanager?
